item.title: Dominoes Colors
item.description:
About This Game

Dominoes Colors


It is a puzzle relaxing game with 30 stages.You need to mix colors when put each piece on board. The mix result is the next step to solve the puzzle. The piece with a chequered flag is the last piece, your last mix of colors needs to be equal of it.

Colors


The game contains 16 different colors, explore your knowledge about colors to discover what will be the next mix result. The "white piece" and "black piece" are special colors, try any kind of combinations with these pieces to identify theirs secrets.

Pieces


Each piece has its own "color side" and "blank side", the blank side will be another color after the colored piece side in your "hand" combine with a colored piece in "board".

Win Condition


The last piece is signaled by a chequered flag, to win you must combine the colors gradually until arrives the last piece.

Coins and Stars


When you finish a stage you will be rewarded with coins and stars according with the quantities of pieces utilized, so if you discovered new ways to complete the same stage, return and unlock all your rewards.

Obstacles and Powerups


According your advance in game, you will notice some obstacles, each one has its own behaviour and complexity. But to help and ease your path, you will can buy powerups with the coins earned in each stage.

item.title: Galactic Breakout
item.description:
About This Game


Galactic Breakout is a modern interpretation of the classic Arkanoid, where you need to break different types of blocks with the paddle - your best friend.

Each of the 75 levels has been thoroughly created by hand and the difficulty will gradually increase with each level.

Main features

  • 3 acts with 25 levels in each
  • 10 unique power-ups - with 3 ultimate ones

  • 10 unique and challenging debuffs - some can easily reduce your score points

  • Various visual effects for different types of blocks

  • Custom and Deterministic paddle physics - control your ball movement as you wish
  • Full gamepad support - use your gamepad to control your paddle and navigate through the UI. You don't need a mouse or keyboard

  • Steam achievements - 15+ various game achievements to encourage you in your journey

item.title: 3DC
item.description:
About This Game

3DC is an educational video game to raise awareness about depression among children between 8 and 12 years old. The game teaches the main symptoms and risk factors, the importance of empathizing with those affected and the need to ask for help if they recognize themselves in a similar situation.
Players live a day in the life of Dante, a 9-year-old boy who has developed depression. They will go through his daily tasks to learn about his problems and try to help him. To do so, they will have to learn about his thoughts, talk to his family and overcome several mini-games.

item.title: Project Scar
item.description:
About This Game

Project Scar is a platform game and Endless Runner, enemies and platforms are randomly generated. You are Scar, the Traveler of the worlds, one day you traveled to a hostile world full of great Goblins (Skull, Red and Green) who stole your travel ship and left you in an endless jungle. Go as far as you can by getting high scores, but it won't be easy. Dodge, escape and defeat the enemies that will chase you. Keep moving or you'll end up sealing your fate.

Have fun and break your records to show off to friends and family, spend time controlling Scar and kill Goblins or run away from them, each new game a new challenge with random appearances and random platforms.

item.title: Shards of Chaos
item.description:
About This Game

Shards.


â€œThey call me Rain without knowing my real name. Rainstorm is my only salvation.
In this shattered world, where I have no friends or enemies... All I have to do is complete my contract and return â€” to find the one who's waiting for me.â€

This is her only path: to willingly fall into the trap, in order to find and protect Lellia â€” at the behest of the contract given by an ancient Temple.
Shards of destinies, endlessly intertwining threads of time; cycles that painfully replace each other... Reflections in the eyes, scarlet â€” a color that outshines the hesitant flame.

These tests of fate will challenge you to figure out the traitor, protect Lellia, unravel the mystery of the magical catastrophe and the cycles of the â€œModern Hellâ€.

A World Abandoned by the Gods.


The action takes place in the abandoned estate of the Order called â€œBlack Roseâ€. A magical catastrophe has crushed the manor, spreading death to all nearby lands, turning people into â€œShadowsâ€. Rain will have to plunge into this cursed place, encountering a mad adventuress and a dragon-girl from the â€œHel'â€ clan; in the darkness.

The dramatic story will unfold piece by piece, adding up to the overall picture of the dark mansion, reacting to your actions. Secrets, betrayals, a Railway beyond Space and Time...
You'll go all this way with Rain. And it depends only on you â€” whether you can solve all the mysteries in time, solve everything without bloodshed... Or whether, on the contrary, you'll follow the scarlet path.

The Path.


  • A non-linear plot that can change depending on your choices.
Build logic chains, decide: whether it's worth the risk, and what approach to choose for one or another character...

  • A dramatic story, not a dating sim.
â€œNothing to worry about... If my blade turns out to be the slowerâ€. Feelings, logic and characters will be matter in this story.

  • The world will not wait while you think about your actions.
A complex system that includes â€œTDAâ€ moments, time-limited choices, and free-exploration moments â€” will allow you to experience the world of the visual novel as a living world, not just as the pages of a book.

item.title: Gunslinger Duel
item.description:
About This Game

Gunslinger Duel is the ultimate showdown in the heart of the Wild West! Step into the boots of a gritty gunslinger and engage in lightning-fast quick draw battles against a roster of increasingly formidable opponents.

With your wits and strategy, choose your moves wisely before the dust settles. Will you go for the lightning-fast draw, dodge with cat-like reflexes, or unleash your special skills to outsmart your rivals? Every decision could be the difference between life and death!

As you conquer each adversary, the stakes get higher, the challenges more intense, and your legend grows. But beware, a single misstep, and you'll be lying in the dust, starting your journey from scratch.

With its captivating low-poly art style, gripping storyline, and heart-pounding gameplay, Gunslinger Duel will transport you to a world where only the quickest, smartest, and most cunning gunslinger will survive. Can you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate gunslinging legend of the Wild West? Draw your weapon and find out!

item.title: Block Hopper
item.description:
About This Game

Block Hopper is a 2D platforming game made with low poly 3D assets. The game comes with two game modes and more to come in the future and each differs in small ways and large ways.
Block Hopper is a game you can enjoy at your own pace or if you want a bit of a challenge you can play Hardcore Mode which restarts you if you aren't fast enough.

item.title: BMX Gravel
item.description:
About This Game

Ready to tear up gravel, get big air and pump out the tricks BMX-style with an adventure journey twist?

Easy to learn, hard to master. Hone your skills and chalk up bigger and bigger numbers the harder and faster you go, all the while discovering new things along the way.

The game has its own distinct soundscape and environment, and each level has something unique to offer. There are also several easter eggs sprinkled throughout the game to find along the way.

The game consists of 20+ levels across 5 stages of gravelly fun with plenty of dynamic BMX mechanics, bonuses and hazards to play through, including a wide array of custom graphics, artwork, music and sound effects.

So put your pedal to the metal and see what lofty heights you might achieve and interesting things you might find in your journey towards BMX gravel mastery.

item.title: Waifu Club - Ayame
item.description:
About This Game



Waifu Club is a very addicting puzzle game in which you must solve puzzles of the lovey Ayame.
Every awesome puzzle has 40 tiles.

The game has an amazing soundtrack, 6 levels of the beautiful Ayame in HD Quality.
This said the game is a perfect way to relax from a hard day at work.

Features

  • 6 levels of beautiful girls
  • Relaxing music and gameplay
  • all images in high HD quality
  • makes you forgot all your sorrows

Game Modes

  • Puzzle Mode
  • Gallery Mode

item.title: Glowstick
item.description:
About This Software

Glowstick is a tool that allows you to build 3D environments and tell stories. We develop tools and features to craft engaging narratives, enabling you to bring your stories to life. Whether you're a seasoned storyteller or a beginner, Glowstick offers an intuitive and user-friendly interface that encourages exploration and sparks the imagination.

item.title: Catty Cathy
item.description:
About This Game

This is the story of Cathy.

She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty. If you do not click on the poop and make it gold, her face will shrivel up and she will not be pretty.

Let's help Cathy look pretty or maybe not!

Use your mouse to tap on Cathy, poop to collect prizes, and tapping on vehicles will release food which makes her poop faster.

On the steam deck tap on the screen just like you would with a mouse.

Y - Use Botox
X - Power up 1
A - Power up 2
B - Power up 3

item.title: Start11 v2
item.description:
About This Software

Start11 v2 allows users to fully customize the Windows 10 and 11 Start menu experience with unique features, designs, and restore classic functionality from previous versions of Windows.

New with Start11 v2 are three new Start menu styles that seamlessly blend with Windows 10 and 11. Each new style is centered around a different theme: Apps, Professional, and Launcher, and are fully customizable from top to bottom.

Start11 v2 also enhances the taskbar with new functionality that makes it faster to access your files and folders. By using our new folder menu option, you can pin any folder to the taskbar and access its contents directly from the taskbar without opening File Explorer. Users can also round the corners of the taskbar to give it a modern design that makes your desktop look like the next version of Windows.

Whatâ€™s New in v2

  • Three new Start menu designs that seamlessly blend in with Windows 10 and 11.
  • Taskbars can now be rounded and floating, creating a modern design for the taskbar on Windows.
  • Pin a folder menu to the taskbar to access contents of the folder without opening File Explorer.
  • Icon tinting lets you stylize app icons in your Start menu with a uniform color for pixel perfect theming.
  • Add tabs to supported Start menu layouts to group icons by type, task, or activity.
  • Automatically add Steam games to a taskbar folder, Start menu tab, or group.
  • Everything search tool Integreation
  • Easily backup and restore your Start menu configuration

item.title: Tulip
item.description:
About This Game

You are a very sad bunny. You cannot stop crying. You might have to drink something gross. You are Tulip.

Wander through a storybook countryside, gather ingredients for a strange brew, and get to know your adorable animal neighbors in an odd quest to alleviate your incurable sadness.

.

TAKE WEIRD ADVICE FROM A MAGAZINE
Guide Tulip on their quest to heal their heartbreak using Miss Kitty's advice column -- and it's odd (and unsubstantiated) tea recipe.

EXPLORE THE COUNTRYSIDE
Six beautifully illustrated levels for Tulip to hop through while completing their ingredients list, with adorable (and sometimes helpful) neighbors to interact with.

PLAY MINIGAMES
Put together bouquets, harvest herbs from Tulip's garden, and solve short music puzzles to help Tulip find what they need.

DRINK SOMETHING GROSS
Once every item is found, put together the final concoction in a tea brewing minigame.

item.title: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom
item.description:
About This Game

GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom is a 2D action-adventure game that challenges you to survive in randomly generated worlds full of enemies and items. You can collect keys from defeated foes and use them at the shop to upgrade your items and stats. Each level has a portal that leads you to a new world with different enemies, items, and terrain. How far can you go in this endless journey of exploration and combat?

item.title: Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom
item.description:
About This Game

PLAY AS A CAMERAHEAD IN SKIBIDI TOILET GAME:


Protect the earth and flush those toilets! Try to get all the materials necessary to build a radio-titan and deal a final blow to the enemy faction. Make sure to have your teammates protect you when you assault the enemy base as a tv titan, you don't want to lose it!

PLAY AS A SKIBIDI TOILET


Embrace the chaos as a member of the Toilets, don't let your enemies build a titan by building your own toiletto-giant first! Crush your enemy with numbers and dance on their graves. Don't let tactics or teamwork slow you down, just rush them and dominate the game.

JUST HAVE FUN!


I don't care if you want to save the earth or conquer it. Just have fun, turn your enemies into trash, and dump them into the garbage bin. It's a game, JUST HAVE SOME SKIBIDI GAME FUN TIME!

item.title: å¶ç¢Ž-é£Žæš´å‰å¤•/Fragmented leaves-Before the Storm
item.description:
About This Game

A battle chess game that even newcomers can quickly get started with

The game has removed a large number of complex operations from battle chess games. Including character attributes, props, number of people, and so on. However, it does not reduce the operational requirements of the game, but rather allows players to make more choices with simpler operations. For example, players can summon and control enemy units to participate in battles. These units have abilities similar to player units. Players do not need to carry a large number of props, but can directly implement the same functions as props in map commands.

Prequel works

I was originally creating a reset version for my first game, but due to the focus being on a more concise war chess game, I lacked experience and made this game to understand the situation. The characters on the cover are actually the ones that will appear in the remake.

item.title: Glory's Fools
item.description:
About This Game

Long ago, in the dawn of man, before the world could be shaped as it is today, the path to becoming a legend was laid bare for all comers. Monsters freely roamed the land and the Gods gave blessings daily. Truly, it was a heroâ€™s haven, if you knew where to go. Recently, there have been tales of a true monster god roaming the land, Medusa. She is said to have the ability to turn anyone foolish enough to challenge her to stone. Are you foolish enough to test this tale? Or will you let glory slip from your grasp?

Featuring:
  • A diverse cast of quirky characters with unique dialogue based on how you play the game!
  • Hours and hours of gameplay
  • Dozens of dungeons to explore filled with mythic beasts, spirits, and slimes.
  • Multitudinous spells, armor, and weapons to find and master throughout the game
  • Over 100 enemy types!
  • Multiple endings based on your decisions!.

item.title: Simple Mosaics - Nonogram Puzzles
item.description:
About This Game

Nonograms, also known as Hanjie, Picross or Griddlers, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture.

* Hundreds puzzles to solve
* Puzzles based on LOGIC
* Auto fill feature
* HD Graphics
* New puzzles are added every week

item.title: Booom-Slang!
item.description:
About This Game

Top-Down, Twin-Stick, FMV-Infused, Action-Packed MADNESS!!!:


Booom-Slang! is a Garage-Indie Action Game with varying Play Modes (both Multi-Player and Single-Player) centered around hunting creeps, collecting treasure, trading in resources to obtain power-ups and competing in a myriad of different ways, while all being wrapped up in a FMV/Low-CG Hybrid Fever Dream.

Developed and Published by South African Solo Indie Dev, Tiaan Gerber (Skermunkel).


Overview:


Players are placed in creep-infested, boundary-shifting arenas, where they need to build up hunting points and collect treasure in order to afford different Power-Ups. In Multiplayer Modes, this gives Players multiple ways of competing against or with each other as well as diverse forms of achievements and challenges, in Single Player modes this will either serve as creative challenges for the Story Dungeon or interesting obstacles or tasks for each consecutive round in other Single Player modes.

Weapons:
With 5 weapons to choose from there is never a dull moment in a round of Booom-Slang! Whether it's the Plasma Rifle for pinpoint accuracy and those deadly kill-shots, the Plasma Shotgun for those spots that just a little bit too crowded, the Plasma RPG when you like to 'live dangerously', the Plasma Sword to get up close and personal or the Plasma Grenade when you just feel like leaving someone a present ;)

Power-Ups:
Hunt Creeps for Points, Collect Treasure, Trade in Resources for Power-Ups, what could be more natural! Protect your vulnerable bag of skin from things like Lava Pits and Rabid Wolf Bites with the Plasma Shield. Burn your enemies (or yourself, lol) with a conjurable Pit of Fire! Hop over those pesky high arena walls and barriers with the Rocket Jump or bring down judgement with a FRICKEN LIGHTNING STRIKE!!! Yeah!!!

Abilities:
Where would one be without Abilities? Truly one of the Universe's most important questions. That's why we gave ya a Teleporter, cause gee golly whizz it sure is neat watching your character zipping and zooming across the screen, ain't it? Then of course, we just had to strap a ridiculous Super Vacuum to your suit so you can bring those juicy boxes a bit closer a bit quicker and yank away the loot right under your opponents' noses.

Premise:


In Booom-Slang! you take on the role of one many clones that is kept prisoner by a deranged mad man running a sadistic live death game. Where each clone needs to compete against other clones, hunting as much of the cloned wildlife, while collecting as much treasure in order to appease the evil showrunner's ratings goals. See, I told you, Fever Dream level stuff...

item.title: Goat's Tale Adventure
item.description:
About This Game



Welcome to the Goat's Tale Adventure! It's an engaging precision platformer whose predecessors gained recognition from over several thousand players on the Steam. Now, we invite you to an entirely new experience with our new heroine taking the lead!

Overview

Enhanced Physics and New Code

Taking into account feedback from the previous two parts, we decided to thoroughly rebuild the game's physics to make it more precise. Now, the heroine moves with significantly improved agility, and the gameplay dynamics have gained a new dimension thanks to the game code written from scratch.

New Mechanics



Changing the main character (we'll see you soon, courier), we focused on introducing unique abilities that highlight her uniqueness. Our heroine, Bouba, has mastered the art of controlling water. Now, every waterfall becomes an elevator for her, allowing her to overcome obstacles and reach even greater heights.

World Exploration



In Goat's Tale Adventure, every level holds treasures to collect, and before them stand powerful monsters ready to be defeated by our heroine.

Goat's Tale Adventure offers:

  • A challenge for the most demanding players.
  • A completely new adventure led by the heroine.
  • Even more captivating gameplay.
  • Wonderful music.
  • New, innovative mechanics tailored to the heroine's abilities.
  • Beautiful, pixel art graphics.

item.title: Exodus
item.description:
About This Game

Venture into this platform game in the Metroidvania genre with a fantastic 2D open world with pixelated graphics in its best retro style.

Moses is on vacation in Egypt, until the terrible Ramses, prince of Egypt, kidnaps his beautiful girlfriend. The hero will have to traverse the scorching desert, descend deep underground and explore the dangerous pyramid of Ramses to find the girl, facing many challenges with enemies, traps, secret passages and bosses.

To accomplish his mission, Moses will count on his weapons, power-ups and items scattered or hidden throughout the map. There will also be shops selling items, power-ups, supplies and hints, so collect as many coins as you can find along the way, including the secret treasure rooms.

Exodus has a save game system, fast travel around the map, achievements in missions, inventory to be able to carry helpful items for the journey, such as life potions, edibles, keys to open doors and much more.

Take on this adventure and test yourself in the challenges of this incredible game, until you complete 100% of the map.

item.title: Sergei and the Tax Return
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Muffinski

Today our Glorious Leader has declared that we the people can now start our own small businesses. A Glorious day indeed!

You had a dream, a dream to run your own private delivery company, you have an office, and you have one employee. The ever-dedicated Sergei to do all the driving.

With Sergei you can begin your business adventure, while Sergei is out on jobs you have to keep on top of the business by giving him jobs and making sure you keep the bills paid. Oh, did we also mention that our great Glorious Leader has decided that you keep on top of the Government Tax Return paperwork?

Also, there is a movement happening in Muffinski. An outrage against our country and Glorious Leader. A group whose only desire it is to see our wonderful most glorious of all Glorious Leaders brought down. The Muffinski United Freedom Fighters (or MUFF for short) are determined to bring down our government.

Wouldnâ€™t want to work for those guys...

In Sergei and the Tax Return you take control of your new business, using your old but still connected office computer you can give Sergei the jobs he needs to do as well as check the news and buy exciting upgrades, like new seatbelts!

You also have to check the Government Tax Return paperwork from other businesses around Muffinski, you start by checking the name of the business against the CEO name to make sure its correct, but before long you'll be checking which area they are from and what the yearly income and outgoings are.

While all this is going on, the phone will ring every now and then and maybe, just maybe MUFF are looking for help...

item.title: Speed Crew
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready

Gather your elite pit stop crew of 1-4 players for a high-octane experience, available both online and locally (likely on your friend's couch). Participate in racing championships, repair arriving cars, navigate challenges like shifting platforms and Dominion Torrento, and secure your victory. A fun and chaotic adventure spanning four decades, from the 70s to the 00s, awaits you.

Build your Crew

Build your pit crew with up to 4 members, assign tasks, and execute clean repairs to double your points and win championships. Teamwork is the key to your success! As a party game, we highly recommend playing it with your family and friends to unlock maximum mayhem. While enjoying it solo might seem less stressful, rest assured, chaos will still be your constant companion.

Fix Cars

Your task is to get your driver back on track as quickly as possible. With this in mind, you'll need to diagnose car issues, make efficient repairs using a variety of tools, and navigate dynamic, hazard-filled pit lanes. Aim for Gold in the championships and give a slap to annoying Dominion Torrento. Also, donâ€™t forget to slap your comrades for proper motivation too.

Win races

Explore 48 levels in 4 Chapters, unlock sponsored races to find hidden prizes â€“ thereâ€™s always a new challenge awaiting. Storm, rain, lava â€“ nothing can stop your team! Discover the entertaining, voiced, and animated story of your crew and their rivalry with Dominion across four decades of championships.

Be stylish

Win races to unlock new characters, collect various looks and create your own fun way to mess with your teammates. Why limit yourself to the chaos on the pit lane when you can also make some of your own?

Unlock Arcade mode for more challenges

Ruin your teammates' championship while being Dominion Torrento himself. Spoil everything they are doing; your goal is to make them suffer sore losers, while their goal is to win no matter what and give you a slap. True friendship level unlocked!

KEY FEATURES:
  • Local and online multiplayer options.
  • Engaging storyline with animated and voiced cinematics, featuring 4 racing championships spanning 4 decades.
  • Unique 48 levels to explore.
  • Arcade mode for those seeking true challenges.
  • Dynamic pit lane filled with a variety of tools, hazards, and car issues to keep the action intense.
  • Customization: pick your character, hat, and costume color.
  • Stylized 3D graphics with a retro touch and custom-made soundtrack for each decade.
  • Suitable for all ages and skill levels.
  • Slaps! Slap Dominion, slap cars, slap your teammates, slap that release button. Become a true pit stop tyrant!



Join the Speed Crew Discord community!

item.title: A Good Place To Die
item.description:
About This Game

A Good Place To Die is a casual, roguelite-style third-person action game where you control a hero in a frenetic battle against hordes of zombies in a closed map.


To follow the development of the game, follow our:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/natalgamestudio/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@natalindiegamestudio8544

With each hit on the zombies you will earn points that are accumulated to upgrade your weapons. You can install and upgrade combat turrets during battle.


When injured, look for active water sources on the map to recover your life.


Every 5 minutes a terrible boss appears and you must face it together with the zombies.

item.title: Love n Life: Lucky Teacher
item.description:
About This Game



After the pandemic Covitch69, the world is facing economic crises. As a result, you, unfortunately, lost your job as a space aviation expert at Nasu. Destiny takes an unexpected turn, leading you from a rich city life to become a teacher in a small town. Luckily, every cloud has a silver lining. Explore a world where love blooms unexpectedly, fulfilling your profession and encountering intriguing ladies with unique backgrounds and personalities. Get ready for an unforgettable visual novel experience.


  • Beautiful girls in Live2d animations.
  • Fun chibi characters, environments, and a beautiful city.
  • Gifts for room decorations and beautiful outfits. Fun minigame.
  • Conversational options that affect affection. Over 20,000 story texts.
  • Realistic texting simulation with awesome effects.


Sato Yuriko ðŸ’• A Spirited Adventure
A student with a lavish background is a gaming addict with an insatiable passion for trends and idol culture. Her vivacious personality and overflowing confidence might make you overwhelmed. She usually puts you in tricky situations, but for someone as seasoned as you, these can become your golden opportunity.


Sato Himari ðŸ’• A Serendipitous Connection
She unexpectedly crosses paths with you while tutoring her younger sibling at their home. Her graceful aura, gorgeous blue eyes, and sunlit smile instantly stir your heart. As unexpected events unfold during these tutoring sessions, a profound connection blossoms between you and the beautiful lady.


Masumi Ishida ðŸ’• Embracing New Beginnings
The director of the educational center where you apply as a teacher is yearning for genuine love due to past heartaches. Upon your arrival, she sees a true hero who has the potential to mend her heart. The tales of her experiences will enrapture you, weaving you into a web of affection.


Liu Xinyi ðŸ’• A Heartwarming Connection
A gentle and diligent overseas student hailing from China. Her quiet demeanor may pose a challenge to forge a close bond, but as you penetrate her shell, youâ€™ll discover a wonderful personality. Your ideal date spot is a cozy cat cafÃ©, where you both can share heartwarming moments.

item.title: The Forgotten Tapes: Twisted Forms
item.description:
About This Game



The Forgotten Tapes is back! This time with a new collection of horror games set to make your body shake. Once again, The Forgotten Tapes is based on a central theme, with new and existing developers all with their own stories to tell. The game will once again allow you to play from a series of VHS tapes that have been found during your night shift at the morgue. But what has brought these 8 lost souls to your door? Not only will you get to experience 8 new stories, but you will also need to experiment, conduct autopsies, and manage your surroundings whilst trying to figure out what is going on.

The Forgotten Tapes: Twisted Forms, will spook and scare you along with its new launcher, set inside an interactive morgue. So grab your scalpel, grab your bone saw, and be prepared to discover what lies within "The Forgotten Tapes".



The theme for this collection is "Body Horror". We understand that body horror is something that everyone can relate to. Whether it be that uncanny person or those extra limbs you've grown, here we have 8 new additional stories to make you scream along the way. Body horror has inspired millions of creations throughout the years and now, we wish to share what we have in store for you all.





Nano: Directed by Adriano Silva

"It grows inside your body; its roots and polyps spread faster than any known body anomaly. It moves and changes everything around it, setting up its own defense mechanisms as if it had a mind of its own.
It is time to test the Nano project."



Autopsy: Directed by Aaron Wise & Sulfer

"When a research center goes radio silent, they send in Dr. Eli Thompson to investigate. The facility had recently discovered a new life form frozen in the ice below. Inside, he is greeted with silence and the bodies of his former co-workers. Desperate to uncover the truth, Dr. Eli Thompson turns to answers by way of carrying out experiments on the dead to find out what happened".



The Sculptor: Directed by Jamie and Razorshark

"A freelance reporterâ€™s investigation into a series of missing local townsfolk takes a dark turn when she finds herself trapped within a starving artistâ€™s frozen obsession."



Flesh Simulator: Directed by Lachlan Shelton

"Play as a little fleshy dude and save your fleshy friends from the fleshy monsters within your fleshy world."



Vaporwave: Directed by Saxon Software & Dreamchaser Games

"Another late night at the TV station. Another night of watching the world go by. Or so you thought.
Strange signal disruptions are blocking out frequencies with no explanation. They carry with them screams, blood, and pain. Someone somewhere is being hurt.
And you have a front-row seat."



Make Beautiful: Directed by Vladimere Lhore

"Tired of being yourself? Wish you could change? Be something more? Then come down to Make Beautiful, where 'WE Make YOU Beautiful'."



Classified: Directed by Adriano Silva

"Classified" is a science fiction mystery game where you play as a scientist tasked with examining the body of an extraterrestrial life form. Conduct a series of exams to understand the body's anatomy, biology, and the being's technology.
Discover its origins and learn the secrets it holds.

THE FALLEN SPIRITS WILL BE RELEASED AT A LATER DATE IN Q2 AS PART OF A FREE UPDATE:



The Fallen Spirits: Directed by D.Zenith, TobiasM & Elegant Crow

"There are talks between kingdoms, of a curse spreading like a wildfire. Many soldiers, workers, and civilians alike ventured into the forest to investigate for themselves, only to never be seen again. A lone child, lost and alone in the forest, comes across a mysterious figure. They decide to follow the figure, traveling deep into the woods. What awaits the poor, innocent soul?"



- 8 games to play through each with its own unique vision, story, and style. (The Fallen Spirits launching in Q2 as a FREE update)

- An interactive hub world to walk around at your own pace, discover VHS tapes to play, and uncover the mystery of the 8 lost souls.

- All games are available from the start and can be played in any order.

- Small puzzles available to solve!

- Scares, atmosphere, and a great time.

- Up-and-coming developers who have great imaginations and with no restrictions on their stories.

item.title: Straight Up
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Straight Up, the exciting climbing game where your goal is to reach the top! Choose from three different maps â€“ small, medium, or large â€“ and face the challenge of jumping on objects like cars, crates, and fences to reach the summit.

The real challenge is to not lose patience and composure when you fall back down. Getting back up requires not only skill but also resilience. After reaching the top, grab the Supply Drop for a reward and complete the level. Then return to the lobby, where you can unlock characters and acquire cosmetic upgrades with the earned coins.

The lobby also offers a tutorial, statistics, and the leaderboard. Fulfill tasks to earn additional coins and experience points. Each level reached is crucial to unlocking new characters and cosmetic items.

Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Straight Up, master the art of climbing, and prove that you are the ultimate height conqueror! Rise to the top and become the champion of Straight Up as you collect rewards and showcase your skills. Are you ready for the challenge?

item.title: Gates Of The Mind
item.description:
About This Game

The average Canadian logger Miles completed his day. On the way home, he is attacked by a bear and Miles loses consciousness.
And Miles is trapped inside his own mind. If you want to wake up the same as before you must to restore your consciousness piece by piece.

Gates of The Mind - is 2D Hardcore Platformer. Game should search you in reaction and ingenuity in boss fights and locations.
Each Boss fight and Location have a phases where you must be accurate in your actions and contains non-linear solutions for opening gates of mind.

Features:
â— Hardcore gamplay
â— Boss fights
â— Non-linear solutions
â— Full Controls supporting
